<a name="VerificationToken"></a>
## type [VerificationToken](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/auth/verification.go#L10-L17>)

VerificationToken represents a single\-use email confirmation token

```go
type VerificationToken struct {
    ID        uuid.UUID
    UserID    uuid.UUID
    Token     string
    ExpiresAt time.Time
    Consumed  *time.Time
    CreatedAt time.Time
}
```

```go
func (t VerificationToken) Expired(now time.Time) bool
```

Expired reports if the token lifetime elapsed relative to the provided instant

```go
func (t VerificationToken) Used() bool
```
